claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is an excerpt from the full prescribing information for Flublok (2024–2025 formula). Under the heading “INDICATIONS AND USAGE,” it states: “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This directly confirms that the vaccine is approved for adults aged 18 and up, thereby supporting the claim.
